description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
NETWORKNET-33731 - Text in rectangle displayed with poor quality when sent email is viewed in browser
NETWORKNET-33736 - EWS: Header stripped off when email sent using EWS
NETWORKNET-33738 - Task Creation in Delegate Folder
NETWORKNET-33741 - EWS: Multiple TOs not fetched properly
NETWORKNET-33742 - Exception trying to load tnef email from file
NETWORKNET-33743 - Email to MHTML conversion: Broken Link image displayed
NETWORKNET-33754 - Thai Characters in MSG file cause exception when loaded in MailMessage
NETWORKNET-33756 - Exchange Server 2003: Message saved as draft doesn't open in Draft mode in Outlook
NETWORKNET-33762 - ValidateMessage doesn't report error
NETWORKNET-33763 - Vote combo box lost when converted from MSG to EML or EML to MSG
NETWORKNET-33766 - Email body shifted to right when sent using Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33767 - Table borders become visible when sent through Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33768 - Formatting lost for text inside Table when sent using Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33773 - EML to TIFF: From and To Fields Missing
NETWORKNET-33782 - Arabic characters alignment disturbed when EML converted to TIFF
NETWORKNET-33783 - Arabic EML body characters garbled when EML converted to MHT
NETWORKNET-33784 - Hebrew characters body alignment disturbed when EML converted to TIFF
NETWORKNET-33786 - Garbage characters found when EML containing Hebrew characters in the body is converted to MHT
NETWORKNET-33788 - Garbage characters found when MSG containing Hebrew characters in the body is converted to TIFF
NETWORKNET-33792 - PST: Attachment not visible when MSGFLAG_READ is marked for a MapiMessage added to the PST
NETWORKNET-33805 - MSG TO EML: Headers disturbed after conversion
NETWORKNET-33807 - Decoding issue while adding EML to PST

Enhancements
NETWORKNET-33721 - Support required for IPM.DistList
NETWORKNET-33779 - Add constructors to MapiNote class
NETWORKNET-33810 - Angle brackets missing in Message-Id header value when EML extracted from PST - (for .NET)

New Feature
NETWORKNET-33757 - Deleting contacts from Exchange server by means of EWS client.
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
